attributes.action: lower the voting age to all those age 16 and over
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the age of 16 someone can leave home, join the army, get married, raise children, get a full-time job and pay taxes yet they have no say in how society is run and who governs them. we say this has to stop and therefore are petitioning the government to lower the voitng age in all public elections to 16

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/votesatageof16/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
